mapper.select:
select
from `tb_order`
`order_id` = #{orderId} and
`product_id` = #{productId} and
`product_name` = #{productName} and
`product_info` = #{productInfo} and
`package_id` = #{packageId} and
`package_info` = #{packageInfo} and
`package_name` = #{packageName} and
`date_info` = #{dateInfo} and
`order_name` = #{orderName} and
`order_price` = #{orderPrice} and
`status` = #{status} and
`salesman` = #{salesman} and
`salesman_mobile` = #{salesmanMobile} and
`addtime` = #{addtime} and
`teamdate` = #{teamdate} and
`whatday` = #{whatday} and
`adult_num` = #{adultNum} and
`children_num` = #{childrenNum} and
`housing_num` = #{housingNum} and
`contact` = #{contact} and
`contact_mobile` = #{contactMobile} and
`remark` = #{remark} and
`user_id` = #{userId} and
`pay_type` = #{payType} and
`pay_status` = #{payStatus} and
`rallying_point` = #{rallyingPoint} and
`order_id` in
#{item} and
`order_id` >= #{orderIdSt} and
`order_id` <= #{orderIdEd} and
`product_id` in
#{item} and
`product_id` >= #{productIdSt} and
`product_id` <= #{productIdEd} and
`product_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Product_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Product_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`product_info` in
#{item} and
(
`Product_info` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Product_info` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`package_id` in
#{item} and
(
`Package_id` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Package_id` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`package_info` in
#{item} and
(
`Package_info` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Package_info` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`package_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Package_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Package_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`date_info` in
#{item} and
(
`Date_info` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Date_info` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`order_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Order_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Order_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`order_price` in
#{item} and
`order_price` >= #{orderPriceSt} and
`order_price` <= #{orderPriceEd} and
`status` in
#{item} and
`status` >= #{statusSt} and
`status` <= #{statusEd} and
`salesman` in
#{item} and
(
`Salesman` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Salesman` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`salesman_mobile` in
#{item} and
(
`Salesman_mobile` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Salesman_mobile` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`addtime` in
#{item} and
`addtime` >= #{addtimeSt} and
`addtime` <= #{addtimeEd} and
`teamdate` in
#{item} and
(
`Teamdate` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Teamdate` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`whatday` in
#{item} and
(
`Whatday` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Whatday` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`adult_num` in
#{item} and
`adult_num` >= #{adultNumSt} and
`adult_num` <= #{adultNumEd} and
`children_num` in
#{item} and
`children_num` >= #{childrenNumSt} and
`children_num` <= #{childrenNumEd} and
`housing_num` in
#{item} and
`housing_num` >= #{housingNumSt} and
`housing_num` <= #{housingNumEd} and
`contact` in
#{item} and
(
`Contact` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Contact` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`contact_mobile` in
#{item} and
(
`Contact_mobile` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Contact_mobile` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`remark` in
#{item} and
(
`Remark` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Remark` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`user_id` in
#{item} and
`user_id` >= #{userIdSt} and
`user_id` <= #{userIdEd} and
`pay_type` in
#{item} and
`pay_type` >= #{payTypeSt} and
`pay_type` <= #{payTypeEd} and
`pay_status` in
#{item} and
`pay_status` >= #{payStatusSt} and
`pay_status` <= #{payStatusEd} and
`rallying_point` in
#{item} and
(
`Rallying_point` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Rallying_point` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
